structure.title: Choose one:
structure.description:
Glancing blow: Inflicted with @Compendium[world.status-items.Dazed] until the end of your next turn.

System Trauma: Parts of your mech are torn off by the damage. Roll 1d6. On a 1–3, all weapons on one mount of your choice are destroyed; on a 4–6, a system of your choice is destroyed. LIMITED systems and weapons that are out of charges are not valid choices. If there are no valid choices remaining, it becomes the other result.
